_sText:
THIS MAP IS OUTDATED, NEW VERSION HERE:
http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/123212 

NEW FEATURES:

Electric chair
Obstacle course
Bomb bascetball
Simon says room (prefab)
Watch tower
Couch room (AKA chair room)
Bath in every cage (prefab)
New weapons in armory
Credits room
Lots of breakable walls and vents
More guns in T cages
More fences and ralings to help CTs confine Ts
Pool Door
More spawn points
More teleports 
Much more new breakable walls/floors, shafts and teleports


BUG/GLITCH FIXES:

Fixed pool "leak" glitch
Fixed Medic sign and football having a invalid texture (likeley caused
by a custom texture)
Fixed some guns in armory having just one clip of ammo

HOW TO INSTALL:

Place ba_whacky_electric_jail.bsp in INSTALLDIR:\Steam\SteamApps\
your username\Counter Strike Source\cstrike\maps

HOW TO UNINSTALL:

Remove the file from the install directory




CHANGELOG: 
v1.0 - Initial Public release
v1.1 - Added a new tower, a race setup (go into the new tower which is in
the race/obstacle course and click the left set of buttons to enable race,
rickt click to disable it. When in race mode everyone but the first person 
will get slayed once the first person touches the finish line.),
fixed some bugs and added a door to the medic (heal) room (use opens).

KNOWN BUGS:
A very small "leak" glitch appears on the side of the simon says room
slightly sticking out of the wall. I am unable to fix this for now, since
working with the simon says room is VERY hard (don't worry, its only visual and VERY hard to spot unless you inspect all nooks and cranies on the map, chances are 99.99% of the people in your server won't see it). 



Enjoy!


PS. Due to lack of playtesters i was unable to properly test my new race setup, so feedback on that would be appreciated. Everything else was playtested ither from me or playtested with more people back when the map was still 1.0
